name: Curve.fi Factory Plain Pool: ibCHF/sCHF
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ibCHF, a synthetic Swiss franc minted from the Iron Bank, and synthetic Swiss franc (sCHF) minted on the Synthetix platform.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ibCHF, a synthetic Swiss franc minted from the Iron Bank, and synthetic Swiss franc (sCHF) minted on the Synthetix platform.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ibCHF, a synthetic Swiss franc minted from the Iron Bank, and synthetic Swiss franc (sCHF) minted on the Synthetix platform.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este grupo contiene ibCHF, un franco suizo sintético acuñado en el Iron Bank, y un franco suizo sintético (sCHF) acuñado en la plataforma Synthetix.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu havuz, Iron Bank'tan basılmış sentetik bir İsviçre frangı olan ibCHF'yi ve Synthetix platformunda basılmış sentetik İsviçre frangı (sCHF) içerir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含由 Iron Bank 发行的合成瑞士法郎 ibCHF 和由 Synthetix 发行的合成瑞士法郎 sCHF。
